shareEmail: Email event link to a friend
welcome: Get ready for your next {wildNight} out
pleaseEnterPhone: You'll receive a one-time passcode to your phone number that will allow you to initiate your session. Please do not share this code with anyone.
sentOTP: We have sent your One-Time Passcode to your number
smsAgree: By pressing 'Register' you agree to our Terms of Use and Privacy Policy, and constent to receive SMS messages
stayInLoop: Stay in the loop with our blogs!
stayInLoopSub: Read all about our upcoming events, previous events, updates, and exciting changes! We aim to write a blog about every major event, noteworthy events will have an entry showing pictures and recollections of the event!
search: Search for artist, event, or venue
firstNameOnly: Please double check that this is your FIRST name only
emailValidReq: Must enter a valid email address
inactiveEvent: This event is no longer accepting ticket purchases, therefore tickets are no longer available
add_ons_warning: Add-ons do not include an entry ticket for you or your guests
tickets_to_mobile: Tickets will be sent to your mobile number
no_entry: Remember: Buying a table does not include entry tickets!
issueProcessingPayment: Oh oh! Looks like there was an issue processing your payment!
processingPaymentError: If you believe this was an error, please get in contact with support. Please have the phone number you used to create your purchase ready to go to facilitate the process.
paymentVerifExp: Sorry! This link has been expired for safety purposes!
viewFromMobile: View your ticket using the link that was sent to the phone number on file.
ticketsNextStep: Now that you have your tickets...
notValidEntry: This ticket is not a valid entry and is solely used to verify an additive.
TIMEOUTX: Please wait {{x}} seconds before requesting a new code
ACCOUNT_LOCKED: Your account has been locked. Please contact support.
LOCKED_ACCOUNTT: Your account has been locked. Please contact support.
overviewDesc: Welcome to your dashboard, this is a quick access point to most platform tools. Here you'll find breakdowns of the most important data and any notifications your account receives will be displayed here as well for your convenience.
enablePayoutsDesc: Enable payouts by setting up your Stripe Connect account and linking your bank account.
inviteTeamDesc: Invite your team members to join your organization to help you get the ball rolling.
createAnEventDesc: Create an event to experience our platform first-hand.
createAVenueDesc: Create a venue to being hosting events.
socialMediaDesc: Link your social media accounts to get the most out of our marketing capabilities.
MEMBER_NOT_REGISTERED: Your invitee must have an account to be invited
ALREADY_IN_TEAM: This user is already part of your team
invalidPhone: Enter a valid 10 digit phone number
eventsDesc: These are all the events your organization has created or is co-promoting, you can quickly access an event by clicking on it.
venuesDesc: These are all the events your organization owns, you can quickly access a venue by clicking on it.
teamRolesDesc: Everyone could use a helping hand, as they say, multiple brains are better than one. You can add valuable members who make your organization run here. You'll also be able to edit the permissions they have so that they can't edit or see everything.
settingsDesc: Quickly edit your organizations information in this page, if you've created your Stripe Connect account you'll also see the information you entered there here.
financesDesc: Welcome to your finances dashboard, here you'll manage all your organizations financial information and set up payouts. You'll be able to see all payouts that have been sent to you and get information on any pending payouts.
contactDesc: Edit your organization's contact information. This information is shown to venues when you request to use their venue for an event.
socialsDesc: Anyone viewing your organizations profile will see your social pages to further connect with you
invalidEmail: Must be a valid email address
eventsDescFeed: Welcome to your events dashboard, you'll be able to manage all your events from here and occasionally see data about how your events are doing
eventFinishedDesc: Now that your event is over, we hope your experience was easy going. Reach out to us if there is any requests you'd like to make. Learn more about your attendees in the {overview} section.
payoutSentVenue: Payout has been sent to the venue.
salesBreakdownDesc: A breakdown of sales grouped to help you understand purchases
salesAnalyticsDesc: A breakdown of sales grouped to help you see what time periods were the best one for your event
waitingDataAttendees: Once we have enough data, you'll see a timelapse of your event's sales.
waitingDataAge: Once we have enough data, you'll see a pie chart of your attendees' age.
reportsDesc: Here you can see all reports and data available for you to download, some reports may not be available yet (those which are greyed out) and some may still be subject to change.
eventRepDesc: View sales, expenses, and bumps broken down in one file
purchasesRepDesc: View every purchase along with the date, name, and number of tickets bought
purchasersRepDesc: View every purchaser along with their name and email
salesRepDesc: View quantity of tickets sold by tier along with the net sales
payoutSent: Payout has been sent to the venue.
availabilityDesc: See base ticket prices and how the sales are doing for your event
salesByPriceDesc: See how different ticket prices performed
purchasesDesc: A breakdown of every ticket sold with some information about the attendee. To learn more about your attendees view the {overview} section
waitingDataPurchases: Your event still hasn't sold any tickets. Once your first sale is made, you'll find more information about it here. Try sharing on social media to boost event awareness
noVenueEventDesc: You haven't chosen a venue for your event. Once you choose a venue, you'll be able to set up the tiers for your event here. Tiers help you set ticket prices for certain sections of the venue
awaitingXconfirmDesc: {{venue}}'s still hasn't accepted the date. Once the venue confirms the event you'll be able to see this section.
scannerUnavailableDesc: Scanner wiil be available once there is less than 12 hours until the event starts, you'll see a prompt letting you know once the scanner is available for use
scannerNotAvailableDesc: This event has finished and scanning is no longer available
scannerTipsDesc: Be wary of fake tickets and screenshots. Our platform does not have swipable tickets, a button must be pressed to access the next ticket.
validTicketDesc: - Ticket has been scanned for the first time and is valid.
ticketScannedDesc: - Ticket has already been scanned and may be being reused
eventLinkSubject: Use this link to scan tickets sold for {{name}}!
noVenueChosenDesc: You haven't chosen a venue for your event. Once you choose a venue, you'll be able to set up the tiers for your event here. Tiers help you set ticket prices for certain sections of the venue
ticketTiersDesc: Tiers can be assigned to sections of tickets, defining their price. Some examples of tiers can include VIP sections, General Admission, and Front Row.
physicalTicketsDesc: You can see all physical tickets printed out here and their respective prices and code values.
noPhysTicksDesc: Physical tickets created will appear here for you to print out using a Boca Printer. If you would like our team to print them and mail them, just send us a message or give us a call.
grossSalesDesc: Amount of sales the event has made, ticket price + fees + applicable sales tax
promoterEarningsDesc: Amount of money accumulated in sales for the promoter
bumpEarningsDesc: Since you own the venue, you can see the amount of earnings your venue has accumulated from this event
taxesCollectedDesc: Sales tax collected from ticket buyers based on the tax percent the venue has setup
publicEventDesc: We'll help you push your event and display it on our events feed. Most promoters will make their events public.
privateEventDesc: You event won't be displayed on our feed and will only we available to those who you share the event link with
name: Name
eventNameDesc: Be bold and descriptive! Event names make your event easier to find online!
eventDescriptionDesc: Add more details such as sponsors or featured guests.
artistsDesc: Increase the engagement of your event and prepare your audience by showcasing the profiles of your artists!
ticketPricesDesc: Prices are dependent on their tier which can be changed at any point
readyToEndDesc: This will stop all purchases, once the event is stopped, sales will be available for payout.
accountSettingsDesc: Manage your account settings and preferences, you are not able to edit name or phone number information without contacting us
purchaseHistoryDesc: Need to find your tickets quickly? You'll find every ticket linked to your phone number here. You can access all event tickets by clicking on the event in the table.
quoteHellen: "Life is either a daring adventure or nothing at all"
rememberNoShare: Remember not to share this link with anyone or they'll have access to your tickets. Tickets can only be redeemed once and are marked as invalid upon entry at venue
useRecentLink: Please use the most recent link sent to your phone number to view your tickets. Tickets will only be accesible using the link that was sent to your phone number. Each link is only associated with the respective purchase made.
ticketLinkLost: Oh no! This ticket link is {lost}!
guestModeDesc: In guest mode you can view all our events, shop tickets, read our blogs, but you won't have access to the rewards our registered users do!
stayInBlogs: Stay in the {loop} with our blogs!
noTickets: You have not purchased any tickets
ACCOUNT_EXISTS: There is an account with this number, try signing in
TOO_YOUNG: Must be at least 13 years old to create an account
